name: jade
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a green precious stone from which jewellery and small decorative items are made, especially in China and Japan: jade earrings The jewellery is crafted from carved jade and bone.
VvoeVale/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
(also jade green) a bright green colour: Dressed in jade green with a matching hat, the Queen unveiled a plaque. The wallpaper bore a jungle leaf pattern in jade and white.
tab1962/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

(also jade green) bright green in colour: She was wearing a jade silk dress. The village is surrounded by tall mountains and jade green tea plantations.

a precious, usually green stone from which jewelry is made, or a blue-green or yellow-green color
